snippet.title: BALLMASTER DEMO TRAILER
snippet.description:
Rolling a ball just became fun again. Take control of Ballmyr, a knight of Ballencia, who tragically lost his life due to betrayal by friendly hands. A shadowy figure emerges and offers Ballmyr a challenge to regain his soul and gain life, by becoming the DEMO BALLMASTER! In this retro arcade-style of a DEMO you can expect: 1st 20 Floors of the 100 full of Hazards and Challenges

2 Unique Floor Themes, Each With Their Own Musical Theme

1 out of 3 Games Modes

Countdown - A timer based mode, where you need to find time to stay alive
20 Ball Skins, which 10 are lost in the world to collect

Can you become the DEMO BALLMASTER?
